verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aadi aadamu marana saasanamu Maa shareeramun eluchundagaa 2 Amarudavai prabhoo bhuviketenchi 2 Maranapu mullu virichi maranamun Gelichina maa prabhuvaa 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papamunundi cheekati nundi Aashcharyakaramagu velugulo nadipi Thana aalayamugaa chesina prabhuku Stuthi mahima ghanata siyonulo arpinchedemeppudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paraloka piluputho prabhu mammu pilachi narakapu Shiksha tolaginche maanundi parishuddulato Mammu cherchina prabhoo nirminchenu ilalo Gruhamugaa thana aathma dwaaraa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mannainadi venukativalene Marala bhoomiki thappaka cherun Maanava sampada keerti mahimalu gatinchi povunila Siyonu maruvaku nee prabhuni{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
